title: U.S. household expenditure on sewing machines 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
In general Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 8.19 was reached at Year 2009
The lowest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 1.54 was reported at Year 2017

The line drastically increased by 1.9 times from Year 2012 to 2013, and lastly, increased by 5.3 times from Year 2017 to 2018.
